title: Science Station 2
summary: A series of short stories set on a space station on the edge of explored space, facing unknown cosmic threats.
author: Sacha

expertSuggestions.comment: A captivating tale that weaves magic and words beautifully. The character development of Aria is particularly strong, but the pacing in the middle chapters could be tightened.
The world-building is exceptional, creating a unique magic system around the power of words. However, some secondary characters feel underdeveloped and could benefit from more depth.
A masterful blend of fantasy and linguistic artistry. The plot twists are unexpected and delightful. Consider expanding on the historical context of the word-weaver conflict for even richer lore.
